__e: Ok, I promise not to ask anymore leading questions, and you're gonna have to stop calling me Dr. Marshall

I think a school teacher... maybe... he can't very well give up being a teacher... even if he teaches privately and earns 200,000 per month... but he can teach certain things... to the girls and boys going to the school... and fight the system that way.
I know that your family business is private and none of my concern.
Why am I not over here asking for a little last minute private instruction?
Which isn't to say that we don't have problems in our private lives from time to time. Of course we do.
I'm pleased to hear that Toph's private lessons are going well, but I want to be sure that she's not trying anything too dangerous.
